ygData.subject: Raising Faction in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, I m a 13th lvl Erudite wizard currently residing in Qeynos. My faction there is pretty good ( I ve killed many gnolls and turned in at least 20 fangs
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,
I'm a 13th lvl Erudite wizard currently residing in Qeynos. My
faction there is pretty good ( I've killed many gnolls and turned in
at least 20 fangs to Capt Tilian )I plan to relocate to Freeport
shortly and would like to get my faction up as quickly as possible.
What and where should I hunt to do this. I'm not as interested in exp
until I build some good faction. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

TIA
Larimus
